## EthersLiquity.withdrawYUSDFromStabilityPool() method

Withdraw YUSD from Stability Deposit.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withdrawYUSDFromStabilityPool(amount: any, overrides: any): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | any | Amount of YUSD to withdraw. |
|  overrides | any |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

any

## Exceptions

Throws [EthersTransactionFailedError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure. Throws [EthersTransactionCancelledError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactioncancellederror.md) if the transaction is cancelled or replaced.

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the Stability Deposit's [collateral gain](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) and .
